title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: When adding a table report item without setting the dataset, the group dialog is not shown. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The group dialog is not shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset for the table report item.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set for the table report item.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 
2. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be shown.
